name: 3 Hours Paris Visit With The “Unforgettable Montmartre” Tour
description: Let's go for a unique ride in Paris! Get behind the wheel of our Twizy, electric vehicle, fun and futuristic car and explore every nook of Paris! Discover Paris with our GPS audio guided tours! Choose one of the tours we prepared for you, follow the route on the GPS or your private Guide, and listen the unusual and historical commentaries on the monuments of Paris you will see!
